name: Trayd
headline: A construction payroll platform designed for same-day pay.
description:
Trayd is a B2B construction payroll platform and back office management system designed for same-day pay. We allow the 7M construction workers in the US to get access to their earned wages 7-10 days sooner than legacy payroll providers. With a unique spin on traditional payroll, Trayd is on a mission to create back office efficiencies for commercial subcontractors while simultaneously addressing the significant labor shortage affecting the $2.1TR North American construction industry. 

Trayd is bigger than construction payroll. It's the promise that the hardest working people get access to their money, as and when they need it, creating greater financial wellness across the board. Not only that, we are pioneering digital cash access for a demographic traditionally overlooked while simultaneously modernizing operations in an industry that has been slow to adapt. The challenges and opportunities with Trayd are abundant, promising an engaging journey ahead.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:construction; industry:proptech; industry:payroll; location:new-york

OUR FEATURES
## Software to track and manage your labor spend
PAYROLL
#### Effortless Payroll
  * Weekly, bi-weekly, off-cycle, and instant pay options
  * Automated prevailing wage overrides
  * Same line reimbursements and bonuses
  * Multi-entity support


[Learn more](https://www.buildtrayd.com/<./payroll>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hvX7FVEjxHj3ts4W7719jETk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/E2G21nn4ycUAqnTsD6FkroFe4w.png)
SCHEDULING AND TIMETRACKING
#### Dynamic Scheduling 
  * Geolocation-based clock-ins and clock-outs
  * Auto-approvals
  * Easy shift creation
  * Real-time shift update notifications 


[Learn more](https://www.buildtrayd.com/<./scheduling>)
PROJECTS AND REPORTING
#### Real-time labor tracking
  * View and track labor costs as they hit
  * Customizable reports
  * Certified payroll reports


[Learn more](https://www.buildtrayd.com/<./reporting>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DSzOrcqcLiUxWM5DByJ3fVcRoyQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Y2jk41NMAEUhKfU7CAXzQAb0.png)
HR AND ONBOARDING
#### Simplified People Management
  * Employee onboarding for W2 and 1099 workers
  * PTO and sick day tracking
  * Expense reimbursement portal
  * Certification tracking


[Learn more](https://www.buildtrayd.com/<./people>)

WHO WE SERVE
## A single platform, for your whole team
### A single platform, for your whole team
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wfb88P4L9Bl0AR9d7wSDtTaR9KQ.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wfb88P4L9Bl0AR9d7wSDtTaR9KQ.jpg)
#### Back-Office 
#### Back Office 
Easy scheduling, automated time tracking, streamlined payroll, and best-in-class reporting and analytics. Built for your firm's growth and scale.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8QE8lzpXctoHS8bs5s9X6Vf0J4.jpg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8QE8lzpXctoHS8bs5s9X6Vf0J4.jpg)
#### Foremen
On-site check-ins, easy approvals of time tracking, in-schedule teams and more. Because no one knows your workers like you do.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/szEI9Bt4Joe8YutEbiGyU353g9A.jpg?scale-down-to=2048)
#### Workers
One place to clock in, see paystubs, message your supervisors, request PTO, and see your schedule. All from the comfort of your phone.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING
  * After years of research, Trayd is unique from all other payroll companies I’ve seen and used. Not only does the platform consolidate subcontractor, employee, and time and attendance data under one roof, but Trayd can customize your payroll, by job site and project, making it quick and easy to access real-time insights in just a few clicks.
**Julian Perez**
**President, Nova Clean Solutions**
  * Trayd has been a game-changer for my company. I went to Trayd to find a fresh solution and was blown away by the overall program. Not only has payroll been a breeze, but now I’m able to send shift assignments from my phone, track my guys hours any time, and run payroll in minutes. The Trayd team is extremely hands-on whenever I have a questions and have truly helped me focus on what really matters - completing projects on time.
**Nick Singh**
**Owner, Sky Rise Construction**

generated_description:
# Trayd: Revolutionizing Construction Payroll

## Overview
Founded in 2022 and based in New York, Trayd is reshaping how payroll functions in the construction industry with its innovative platform. Part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Trayd focuses on providing a construction payroll and back office management system that enables same-day pay. This aims to address a significant need for the seven million construction workers in the U.S. who often face delays accessing their earned wages.

## Mission
Trayd's mission is simple yet powerful: empower the hardest working individuals in the construction sector by ensuring they can access their money when they need it. By providing wages 7-10 days sooner than traditional payroll providers, Trayd fosters greater financial wellness among workers. Beyond payroll, the company aims to streamline operations for commercial subcontractors while also tackling the urgent labor shortages faced by the $2.1 trillion North American construction industry.

## Features
Trayd's offering goes beyond basic payroll. The platform includes dynamic scheduling, real-time labor tracking, and comprehensive people management tools, allowing construction firms to enhance efficiency across their operations. Key features include:
- **Effortless Payroll**: Options for weekly, bi-weekly, off-cycle, and instant pay, complete with automated wage overrides.
- **Dynamic Scheduling**: Geolocation-based clock-ins and easy shift management.
- **Real-time Reporting**: Customizable reports to track labor costs as they accrue.
- **Simplified HR**: Onboarding for both W2 and 1099 workers, along with PTO tracking and expense reimbursement capabilities.

## Customer Feedback
Trayd has garnered positive testimonials from its users. Julian Perez, president of Nova Clean Solutions, noted the platform's unique ability to consolidate subcontractor, employee, and attendance data efficiently. Nick Singh, owner of Sky Rise Construction, praised Trayd as a game-changer, highlighting its user-friendly interface that streamlines operations.

## The Team and Future
With a small but dedicated team of four, Trayd is poised to grow. Led by Group Partner Jared Friedman, the company is positioned to continue its trajectory of innovation in the payroll domain, particularly for the traditionally underserved construction workforce. 

For those looking to revolutionize how they handle payroll in construction, Trayd is worth exploring. Their mission and offerings promise a brighter future for both workers and employers in the construction industry. Check them out at [buildtrayd.com](https://www.buildtrayd.com/).
